Title: Advance into the 21st century - Celebrate the 50th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China
Designer: Design Institute of Wuxi Light Industrial College (无锡轻工大学设计学院)
Publisher: Jiangxi meishu chubanshe (江西美术出版社)
Notes: Jiang Zemin was Deng Xiaoping's successor as Party leader. Before that, he had been the mayor of Shanghai, among many other functions. Behind him the new Shanghai skyline is shown: the Pudong side, with the Oriental Pearl TV Tower. On the right is a Chinese rocket. The two symbolize China's economical and technological development.
